entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Whitby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:02 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries beginning early this morning and ending near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h then west 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
